about_the_game:
This is a roguelite game that combines the genre's core elements with lighthearted daily-life stories, puzzle-solving, satisfying combat, a variety of fascinating creatures and skills, and traditional hardcore bullet-hell mechanics.

As the story progresses, players can find game cartridges in the lobby, allowing them to access the first stage via the arcade machine. In each stage, players can level up and choose from various skills, including active abilities that can be used at the right moments. To succeed, players must carefully select their skills and use movement tactics to uncover the keys to victory.

We will be releasing regular updates in this official version.

                                                                                                                         Judgment Cat Studio
